listitem.simpara: WebMDS version 4.0.5 has been tested with Tomcat versions 5.0.28, 5.5.23, and 6.0.13; it has been tested on RedHat Linux (i386) and, to a lesser extent, on Windows XP.
Previous versions of the WebMDS server have only been tested with Tomcat version 5.0.28.
On the client side, WebMDS should be accessible from any web browser on any platform.
